dockerVolumeConfiguration.description: Configuration block to configure a docker volume. Detailed below.

efsVolumeConfiguration.description: Configuration block for an EFS volume. Detailed below.

fsxWindowsFileServerVolumeConfiguration.description: Configuration block for an FSX Windows File Server volume. Detailed below.

hostPath.description: Path on the host container instance that is presented to the container. If not set, ECS will create a nonpersistent data volume that starts empty and is deleted after the task has finished.

name.description:
Name of the volume. This name is referenced in the `sourceVolume`
parameter of container definition in the `mountPoints` section.
